ygData.subject: Some Tinkering Thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone else other than me think that the silk lined steel helm is a tinkering component? It really isn t that good as armour, and the silk lining makes me
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone else other than me think that the silk lined steel helm
is a tinkering component? It really isn't that good as armour, and
the silk lining makes me think that its for insulation....

Also I was looking at that pic of the gnomish pistol/shotgun that was
posted before and noticed some other pics on that page that should be
of interest. Looks like a gnomish flying machine!

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight1.jpg

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight2.jpg

http://n.ethz.ch/student/brunoh/download/flight3.jpg

Doesn't look like he was successful but it shows that once upon a time
Verant DID work on the tinkering skill.

Maybe some of these recipe's are not in the books at all - tinkering is
like inventing - sometimes you just do it with no guidance....

Nalasren
